includedAssets.title: Flowers for Your Grave
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep1 - Flowers for Your Grave
includedAssets.synopsis: Author Rick Castle (Nathan Fillion) helps the NYPD hunt a serial killer who recreates the murders from his book. Hit US crime drama.

includedAssets.title: A Death in the Family
includedAssets.altTitle: S1, Ep10 - A Death in the Family
includedAssets.synopsis: Season finale. A plastic surgeon is gruesomely murdered. Castle looks into the death of Beckett's mother, despite her protests.

includedAssets.title: Season 1
includedAssets.synopsis: NYPD Detective Kate Beckett (Stana Katic) is forced to seek the help of best-selling author Rick Castle (Nathan Fillion) when a serial killer begins to copy murders from his book. With Beckett proving an inspirational cure for his writer’s block, Castle begins to shadow her for is new book. Smash-hit U.S. crime drama.
includedAssets.shortSynopsis: For his new book, author Rick Castle (Nathan Fillion) shadows NYPD Detective Kate Beckett (Stana Katic), providing both valuable and infuriating help.
includedAssets.mediumSynopsis: NYPD Detective Kate Beckett (Stana Katic) is forced to seek the help of best-selling author Rick Castle (Nathan Fillion) when a serial killer begins to copy murders from his book. With Beckett proving an inspirational cure for his writer’s block, Castle begins to shadow her for is new book. Smash-hit U.S. crime drama.

includedIn.title: Castle
includedIn.synopsis: After he is asked to help investigate real-life murders copied from his best-selling series, author Rick Castle shadows the NYPD’s Detective Kate Beckett as research for his next book.
includedIn.shortSynopsis: Author Rick Castle is asked to help investigate murders copied from his best-selling series, then stays with the precinct to research his next book.
includedIn.mediumSynopsis: After he is asked to help investigate real-life murders copied from his best-selling series, author Rick Castle shadows the NYPD’s Detective Kate Beckett as research for his next book.
